title: Great Mount Airy Home
description:
This is a beautiful home on a quiet, one-way, tree lined street in East Mount Airy.
Bright and spacious with a small front garden and porch, the home features hardwood floors throughout, a first floor living room with French Door entrance, dining room, a full bathroom, and kitchen with a large pantry. The second floor includes three bedrooms (or office/study space), a full bathroom, and hallway linen and clothes closets.
The basement includes washer/dryer and allows for plenty of storage space. The home has an attached one-car garage for additional parking or for use as a workshop, exercise center, or additional storage.
The home is 1.5 blocks from the Mounty Airy train station and a 20-minute drive to Center City Philadelphia. It is close to the restaurants, shops, and services in Mount Airy- and even closer to the incredible array of craft beers offered at the Brewer's Outlet! It's a short distance to neighboring Chestnut Hill as well as the biking and hiking trails of the Wissahickon Valley Park.
All outdoor garden maintenance and snow removal are provided at no cost.
The monthly rent is $2,250, plus electric and gas. The home is available June 1, 2023. There is an application and credit review fee of $35 per lessee.

title: You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure!
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304

description: Welcome to 2219 Emerald Street, Unit 4! Emerald Square is a 5 unit high-end condominium building located in the heart of Fishtown. Developed by the highly talented and renowned, Stamm Development Group, Emerald Square has only 2 units left available! These units come fully equipped with a Sonos Sound System, NEST thermostat and Alpha entry doorbell, 1-Year Builders Warranty & FULL 10 Year Tax abatement! Unit 4 features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 1,300 square feet of living space. Upon arrival, walk straight into the open floor plan layout. This main level is home to the living & dining area with an abundance of natural light from the large floor-to-ceiling windows. Off of the living space is the stunning chef’s kitchen with high-end finishes throughout. This kitchen features Whirlpool Black Stainless Steel appliances, white quartz countertops, tons of two toned UltraCraft Cabinetry for kitchen storage, white herringbone tile backsplash, and an enormous kitchen island with plenty of counter space, a 4-burner gas stove with range hood and room for barstool seating. Off of the stunning chefs kitchen you will find additional counter space, custom shelving and cabinet storage next to the refrigerator. Head up the staircase to the second level, this level is home to 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms and access to the back staircase of the building, which doubles as a second entryway into the unit. Each bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows, closet space and pristine hardwood flooring. The bathrooms are fully equipped with designer tile and UltraCraft vanities, one with a glass cased stand-in shower & one with a fully hex tiled shower tub. Make your way up to the third level which gives access to the spectacular private rooftop deck. This rooftop deck features unobstructed city-wide views and tons of space for relaxing or entertaining guests. In close proximity to Philadelphia’s hottest spots like Suraya, Evil Genius Beer Company, LMNO Philly, Front Street Cafe & so much more! 2219 Emerald Street Unit 4 is perfect for your next home. Schedule your tour today!
